r5 <- 58u32
r6 <- 16u32
r7 <- 69u32
r1 <- input
output <- r1
// Check base case
// 17: [r3] <- 1
0b0011_0011,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000001,
// 22: [r2] <- [r1] - [r3]
0b11_10_1011,
0b0001_0011,
0b0010_0000,
// 25: JMP [r7] IF [r2] == 0
0b11_10_1111,
0b0010_010_0,
0b0111_0000,
// Check parity
// 28: [r2] <- 2
0b0011_0010,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000010,
// 33: [r2] <- [r1] % [r2]
0b11_10_1101,
0b0001_0010,
0b0010_0000,
// 36: JMP [r5] IF [r2] == 0
0b11_10_1111,
0b0010_010_0,
0b0101_0000,

// Odd:
// 39: [r2] <- 3
0b0011_0010,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000011,
// 44: [r1] <- [r1] * [r2]
0b11_10_1001,
0b0001_0010,
0b0001_0000,
// 47: [r2] <- 1
0b0011_0010,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000001,
// 52: [r1] <- [r1] + [r2]
0b11_10_1010,
0b0001_0010,
0b0001_0000,
// 55: JMP [r6]
0b11_00_1111,
0b0000_111_0,
0b0110_0000,

// Even:
// 58: [r2] <- 1
0b0011_0010,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000000,
0b00000001,
// 63: [r1] <- [r1] >> [r1]
0b11_10_0111,
0b0001_0010,
0b0001_0000,
// 66: JMP [r6]
0b11_00_1111,
0b0000_111_0,
0b0110_0000,
// 69: HALT
0b01000000,
